title: Citi Releases Third Quarter 2012 Earnings
summary: Earlier this morning, Citi released its earnings report for the third quarter of 2012. Chief Financial Officer John Gerspach discusses the report in this video.
tag-2: Earlier this morning, Citi released its earnings report for the third quarter of 2012. Chief Financial Officer John Gerspach discusses the report in this video. For more information and the full earnings report, visit the Investor Relations section of Citigroup's website.
